channel.title: Adamant PK
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Adamant PK[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[size=14pt][b]Overview[/b][/size] We have decided to scrap our plans to further develop the DSPK source. We will be using a completely new PI base. We'll keep up on our progress and let you guys know if we need any help.
[size=14pt][b]Goals[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Finish major development on server[/li] [li]Launch advertising plan[/li] [li]Buy vBulletin[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]Server Breakdown[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Finish Summoning[/li] [li]Finish Hunter[/li] [li]Balance combat triangle[/li] [li]Add unique features[/li] [li]Modify landscaping [textures][/li] [li]Rework GWD[/li] [li]Move npcs/objects[/li] [li]Add specialty areas[/li] [li]Fix clan chat[/li] [li]Add music files[/li] [li]Add notes interface[/li][/ul]
[center][size=18pt][u][b]Team[/b][/u][/size]
[size=12pt][b]Owners[/b][/size] Brandon Jake Percy
[size=12pt][b]Server Coders[/b][/size] Jake Percy
[size=12pt][b]Client Developers[/b][/size] (open) (optional)
[size=12pt][b]Lead of Advertisement[/b][/size] God Pure
[size=12pt][b]Administrators[/b][/size] (open)
[size=12pt][b]Moderators[/b][/size] Chris (open)
[size=12pt][b]Lead of Graphics Design[/b][/size] (open)
[size=12pt][b]Web Developer[/b][/size] (open) [/center]
As you can see we are looking to have a large team. All groups play an important role in the development and progression of this server. If a staff member feels that they need to take leave or wish to quit, they will be replaced.
[code]Application:
Age: Position: Experience: Time Zone: MSN: [/code]

item.title: Adamant PK
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

[quote=“Sanity Maiden, post:34, topic:383028”]Age: 14
Position: Moderator
Experience: I have been mod multiple times during my rsps time, i have played RSPS for 3 years now, i also code java and javascript.
Time Zone: London GMT
MSN: teh-dagon-hai@hotmail.co.uk[/quote]

I’ll have Jake and Percy review your application as soon as we get things up and running again.

Read full topic

I would also try to help players ingame at the same time.

Experience: Making videos, maing servers, coding and advertising
Time Zone: UTC (Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London

I’ll be adding you for a follow up on this application.

We’ve moved to a better source (hurray!)
[/quote]
Have not. You failed to understand our rules. You were not meant to delete the original source. I had a copy of the source hidden within the VPS in the case that it got deleted. I’ve changed the password to the VPS and my hosting and have dropped your position. Sorry for taking your day from you.[/quote]

Nobody even told me any rules, I just figured we were going to use my source. Stealing peoples sources gives you a bad reputation around here. But yea, i sent you a pm.

item.title: Adamant PK
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“Lazyness, post:20, topic:383028”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=478809.msg3506304#msg3506304 date=1298174379]I would join, but I’m on my second attempt at a framework lol. Sorry. Check my development thread for more information.
[/quote]

I’d love for you to join. You seem to know what you are doing. I’ll have a look at it.[/quote]

Only problem is I can’t, once I finish my project I’ll think about it. I advise not to use DSPK though. You want it to be origional, try use Hyperion or Rs2d or even Emulous, then you will have an origional server. Maybe look into an old release of mine, C-11. Pretty origional based off Emulous. Has a some-what good combat with nice mage tickers.

Read full topic

Age: 14
Position: Server Developer
Experience: wL Base I started but never finished — PI Base I released
Time Zone: US Central

Since I personally know you, I’ll let you have a shot. I no longer have your MSN being that I cleared my list of all players from ‘you know what’ ;). If you could, please send me your MSN once more and I’ll be happy to add you.

Kaex:

I would join, but I’m on my second attempt at a framework lol. Sorry. Check my development thread for more information.

I’d love for you to join. You seem to know what you are doing. I’ll have a look at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adamant PK
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

I’m in terrible need of a good server developer. I need a developer that has good knowledge on how to properly make a server. You must be able to do the following things if you wish to apply:

Easily be able to add/delete objects
Easily be able to modify shops, drop-box options (trade, follow, talk), and textures
Be able to make commands
Modify interfaces
Edit buildings

Basically I’m in need of a really talented coder. I’ll be paying dividends to the coder that has the experience that I require. If you know anyone that will be able to help me out, I’d appreciate it so much.

Read full topic
